review: The Roku is definitely a better product. The menu option is not functional if you use more than just Prime video. the search feature is a joke. Between both my roku and my fire stick, the fire stick lags and has to load constantly and I have never had that issue with my Roku. I definitely plan on sticking to a roku.
author: sarah kelly

review: Oh my goodness this is the best I love my fire stick this is great I don't even watch my cable in I'm a nexflix customer so I get to watch that in other shows Thank You Amazon great job

review: Easy set up, easy navigation. Great solution to get all the apps you use in one place. I would recommend to a friend!
